basic.name: Healing Beam (Q)
basic.description: Heal target allied Hero or Minion for 172 Health per second as long as they are in range.

basic.name: Medivac Dropship (W)
basic.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. The first allied hero that enters will make the Medivac take off. Lasts 3 seconds on ground.

basic.name: Displacement Grenade (E)
basic.description: Fire a grenade that can be manually detonated, dealing 208 to nearby enemies and knocking them away.

heroic.name: Steroids Charge (R)
heroic.description:
{highlight}Activate to grant the current Healing Beam target a 50% increase in attack speed and a 10% movement speed bonus for 6 seconds. {/highlight}

{highlight}Redirecting the healing beam leaves the previous target with 0.5 seconds of the effect{/highlight}

trait.name: Caduceus Reactor (T)
trait.description: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales regenerates 2% of her maximum Health per second.

1.name: Caduceus Feedback
1.description: {highlight}Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 1 Energy.{/highlight}

1.name: Life Support
1.description: {highlight}Morales now receives all movement speed bonuses from the target she's healing.{/highlight}

1.name: Clear!
1.description: {highlight}Morales now reduces the Displacement Grenade cooldown by 3 seconds when hitting 2 targets.{/highlight}

4.name: Cellular Reactor
4.description:
Cooldown: 30s
Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 30% of her maximum Health over 3 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.
passives: {highlight}Prevents Morales from losing Energy upon death.{/highlight}

4.name: Trauma Trigger
4.description: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 40 Armor for 3 seconds. This effect has a 30 second cooldown.
passives: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 4% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

4.name: Blast Shield
4.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade are Slowed by 50% for 1 second after being knocked away and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health. This shield stacks up to 5 times.

7.name: EMP Grenade
7.description: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 96 damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 bonus damage to Shields.

7.name: System Shock
7.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 3 seconds.

7.name: Bedside Manner
7.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade will take an additional 6% of their maximum Health as damage from Lt. Morales's next Basic Attack against them.
passives: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 1% of their maximum Health as damage.

10.name: Kritzroid
10.description: {highlight}Steroids charge now makes allied heroes' basic attacks deal an extra 30% damage.{/highlight}

10.name: Caffeineroids
10.description: {highlight}Increase Steroids charge movement speed bonus by 25% and makes the target unkillable.{/highlight}

10.name: Get back to the fight-roids
10.description: {highlight}Targets receive additional healing equal to 330% of the Healing Beam.{/highlight}

13.name: There's always room for one more
13.description: {highlight}Medivac now takes off 5 seconds after being used and can carry any amount of people.{/highlight}

13.name: Ambulance driving
13.description: {highlight}Now Medivac calls upon Morales after 1 second of channeling, the Medivac is 150% faster and has the cooldown reduced by half plus instantly takes off as soon as it's used.{/highlight}

13.name: Reinforcements
13.description: {highlight}Call down a Medivac Dropship at your Hall of Storms for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when a hero enters, the Medivac will travel to the target location to unload the passenger.{/highlight}

16.name: Extended Care
16.description: Channeling Healing Beam on a Hero for at least 3 seconds causes them to be healed for 258 over 3 seconds when Healing Beam ends.
passives: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%.

16.name: First Responder
16.description: {highlight}Morales can overheal targets, granting them an overshield up to 20% of their maximum health that rapidly decays after 5 seconds. Healing resets the shield duration.{/highlight}

16.name: Medigrenade
16.description: {highlight}Morales' Displacement Grenade now gets bigger the farther it travels, up to 40% extra. On explosion, it also heals allied heroes in the area by 480.{/highlight}

20.name: Safe Zone
20.description: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 3 seconds.
passives: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship abilities by 15 seconds.

20.name: Focus Morales!
20.description: {highlight}When Morales dies, every allied heroes nearby will receive the overcharge effects for 4 seconds.{/highlight}

20.name: Healing Beacon
20.description: {highlight}Morales drops a beacon with 1200 health for 12 seconds. If Morales redirects her healing beam to the beacon, all allied heroes within 6.5 range of that beacon will receive the Healing Beam and overcharge effects used by Morales.{/highlight}

20.name: I am Ambulance!
20.description: {highlight}Activate to increase Morales' movement speed by 125% and grant her unstoppable for 4 seconds.{/highlight}
